name: Merge Master Blue Monster
description:
Merge, Fight and Challenge yourself to become the king of Merge Master Blue Monster.

HOW TO PLAY
- Merge the same animals or warriors to Create stronger monsters and Discover the story of the Toys Company and the mysterious facility of the abandoned toy factory
- When you unlock the new animals or warriors, you will have the opportunity to create the successful Blue Monster, Pinky Monster...
- Be quick to react and think
- The monster's assault and defense get more powerful as it is level rises

GAME FEATURE
- The game is completely FREE
- Satisfying color explosions
- Many monsters, animals, or plants combining
- Super smooth swipe control
- Blending of horror survival style with a familiar merge master game
- Funny, challenging, and addictive

Merge to evolve, Build your powerful team with Merge Master Blue Monster.. & be the 1% of gamers who complete the task and unlock all of the creatures. Are you ready for this challenge???
